page.title: 15Roads/pavements in Rochford.
page.content: Rochford Town Centre is square.On Tuesdays they have a market.Otherwise it is used as a car park.We looked at the street and the pavements.First of all we looked at the ground,it was quite uneven and the road was sloping as well.The pavement was wide enough for people to walk on but in places it was quite narrow.There were things like bus stops, fruit displays, signs that obstructed the pavement.The speed limit is 30 m.p.h on the road and there are double yellow lines and white lines. There aren't any pelican crossings or zebra crossings.Cars can only park when the market isn't there and the only time when vehicles unload on the street is when the market is there.There are signs for traffic along the street,there are also manholes and drain covers on the road which is quite dangerous for cyclists.
